        public void onSelected(int item,
                       boolean doubleClick)
        Description copied from interface: ListWidget

        Specified by:
        onSelected in interface ListWidget
        Overrides:
        onSelected in class GenericListWidget
        Parameters:

        doubleClick - if true, item has been doubleclicked.
